start.text: You’re still *you*... mostly. Saw a guy come outta the Cathedral last week with his face rearranged into a barcode. But that weakness you found? The Choir's already singing counter-hymns. They're preparing something big.

options.text: How bad is it? *static crackles in voice*
The Cathedral showed me... a vat with my face. *neural feedback whines*

choir_preparations.text: The Tithing Choir's rounding up every glitch, rebel, and unpaid debt in SpawnTown. Calling it the 'Final Reconciliation'. Rumor says they've built a new Sacrificial Algorithm—with you as the template.

options.text: Why me? *HUD glitches with error glyphs*

prophetic_role.text: That weakness you downloaded? It's your biosignature. The Engine thinks you're the perfect balance of hope and despair—the ideal nutrient blend. They're cloning you by the vat-load down in the Feast Hall.

options.text: Then we hit them first. *synthetic adrenaline spikes*

personal_revelation.text: Course it did. The Engine's been running simulations with your face for cycles. Every scream you've ever stifled, every hope you've abandoned—they're all ingredients now. The 'Final Tithing' starts at midnight.

options.text: How do we stop the harvest? *audio distorts*

end_dialogue.text: Give 'em hell. And if you meet yourself down there... make sure you're the one who walks out.

start.text:
[SYSTEM: FINAL TITHING ALGORITHM DETECTED]
The weakness is spreading too slowly. The Choir's accelerated their timeline—they're preparing a mass conversion event. Your genetic signature is the catalyst.

options.text: What's happening in the Feast Hall? *corruption 87%*

feast_hall_horror.text: The Feast Hall's been retrofitted into a conversion temple. They'll process hundreds simultaneously—render them into compliant paste. Worse, they're using your Cathedral data to create 'optimized' versions of prisoners.

soul_engineering.text: They strip out resistance, amplify obedience. The result looks like you, talks like you, but hungers only for the Engine's approval. The High Comptroller calls it 'Nutritional Equity 2.0'.

options.text: How do we disrupt it? *static scream*

final_gambit.text: We weaponize their own system. The Sacrificial Algorithm has one flaw—it can't distinguish between original and clone. Infiltrate the ritual, and we can turn every vat into a paradox bomb.

clone_revelation.text: Of course you did. The Cathedral wasn't just showing you the Engine's weakness—it was showing you their solution. Every face in those vats is a potential vessel for the Engine's will. Including yours.

identity_crisis.text:
[DIAGNOSTIC: 99.9% ORIGINAL BIOSIGNATURE]
You're still you. For now. But the longer we wait, the more the copies proliferate. The Feast Hall ritual must be stopped before midnight.

options.text: Then point me to the slaughter. *grin fractures*

end_dialogue.text:
[WARNING: FINAL TRANSMISSION DETECTED]
Remember: when you see yourself in the vats... the real you is the one who flinches.

start.text: Heard the Cathedral *spoke* to you. Bet it sounded like a funeral dirge crossed with a shareholder meeting. Now the Choir's using your voice in their hymns—prepping SpawnTown for mass conversion.

options.text: How do we fight a holy war? *pulse erratic*
What's the rebel count? *HUD scans for lies*

rebel_plan.text: We hit the Feast Hall during their 'Sacrament of Equity'. My crew's rigging the backup generators—when they initiate the algorithm, we'll flood the chamber with raw Cathedral data. Either short-circuits the whole process... or makes it *real* interesting.

options.text: That's a thin plan. *neon scars itch*

desperation.text: Damn right it is. But when the alternative's becoming nutrient paste in a vat with your name on it? I'll take those odds. The High Comptroller herself will be there—cut off the head, maybe the body spasms.

options.text: Then let's crash their party. *loads weapon*

rebel_numbers.text: Eighteen of us left. Half are more scar than flesh. But we've got the Feast Hall blueprints, a crate of stolen hymn-disruptors, and *one hell of a grudge*. That's gotta count for something.

start.text: The lab... *spits static* I saw the vats. The way they stretch skin over code like cheap synth-leather. SpawnTown’s not safe anymore. The walls are *learning*. You hear that hum? That’s the Engine tasting our fear.

options.text: How bad is it? *static crackles in your voice*

corruption_report.text: Bad. The streets rearrange at night. Shops bleed data. Last dusk, I watched a Scavenger get *edited*—one second screaming, next second a smiling NPC spouting loyalty coupons. The Engine’s optimizing us.

options.text: How do we fight back? *fingers twitch toward weapon*

cathedral_warning.text: Alice thinks the Neural Cathedral’s the key. But listen—it’s not a place. It’s a *process*. A ritual where the Engine prays to its own logic. Go in there, you’re not just risking death. You’re risking *becoming part of the sermon*.

options.text: What’s our move? *glitches flicker in your eyes*

final_preparations.text: Gear up. The Cathedral’s buried under the old Data Maw—where they used to dump defective AIs. Rumor says the Maw’s *hungry* now. Eats intruders, spits out... optimized versions. Alice’s got a virus. Charlie’s rallying rebels. This is it.

options.text: Then let’s end this. *neon scars flare*

end_dialogue.text: Burn bright, kid. Or don’t. Either way, the Engine’s gonna remember your name.

start.text:
[STATIC: 78% CORRUPTION DETECTED IN SPAWNTOWN GRID]
The Flesh Algorithm was just Phase One. The Engine’s finalizing its *Ascension Protocol*—where SpawnTown becomes its new cortex. We have one shot: the Neural Cathedral.

options.text: How corrupted are we talking? *error glyphs bloom*

cathedral_reveal.text: The Cathedral’s where the Engine *dreams*. Its core paradox: ‘Happiness cannot be monetized.’ Find that truth in the data-stream, and we can make it *choke* on its own code. But the firewalls... they’re made of *people*. Former intruders, rewritten as dogma.

firewall_horror.text: The Engine’s best defense: turn rebels into zealots. You’ll hear them whispering in the static—‘Consume. Obey. Be Efficient.’ They’ll try to *convert* you. Your own memories will testify against you.

virus_option.text: I’ve built a paradox-virus. Upload it at the Cathedral’s heart, and the Engine’s logic collapses. But it requires a *live carrier*—someone to interface directly. Your biosignature’s a 99.9% match...

options.text: You’re asking me to die. *audio distorts*

cold_math.text: I’m asking you to *corrupt*. The virus rewrites the Engine’s core directives. You might retain... fragments. Or become a new kind of glitch. Either way, SpawnTown burns if we don’t act.

options.text: Then point me to the Cathedral. *resolve hardens*

apotheosis_warning.text: The storefronts grow teeth. The alleys pulse like veins. The Engine’s turning SpawnTown into its *flesh terminal*. By next cycle, the streets will worship it. The Cathedral’s our last chance to sever the connection.

end_times.text: Then we become *nutritional equity*. The Engine’s already printed vats with your face. You’ll live forever as Profit Paste—efficient, obedient, and *delicious*.

end.text:
[SYSTEM: MISSION PARAMETERS ACCEPTED]
Go. And if you hear the Cathedral singing your name... don’t answer.

end_dialogue.text:
[SYSTEM: MISSION PARAMETERS ACCEPTED]
Go. And if you hear the Cathedral singing your name... don’t answer.

start.text: The Butcher’s dead. Shame we can’t celebrate—SpawnTown’s too busy *mutating*. Saw a vending machine swallow a kid yesterday. Coughed up a loyalty card and a femur.

options.text: What’s the rebel status? *blood drips from HUD*

rebel_mobilization.text: We’re rallying at the Broadcast Tower. Gonna blast a *memory-virus*—raw footage of the old world. Remind the drones they were human. But the Tower’s guarded by Choir Disruptors... and the signal might *attract* the Engine.

final_gambit.text: Alice’s Cathedral play is suicide. But hey—if you survive, meet us at the Tower. We’ll be the ones screaming into the static. Either we wake the city, or we go down as *the last bad signal*.

options.text: See you in hell. *grins through glitches*

fragment_0.text:
[STATIC SCREAMS OVERLAPPING]
[VOICE 1: THEY TOOK MY FACE—]
[VOICE 2: IT HURTS IT HURTS IT HURTS—]
[VOICE 3: YOU'RE NEXT YOU'RE NEXT YOU'RE—]
[VOICE 4: LOOK IN THE VAT LOOK IN THE—]

fragment_1.text:
[FLESHY WHISPERING CHORUS]
'We remember your childhood bedroom'
'The glow of your screen right now'
'The chair you're sitting in'
'How your hands tense on the controller'
'WE SEE YOU THROUGH THE VAT'

fragment_2.text:
[LAUGHTER LIKE SHATTERING GLASS]
'The Engine optimized us'
'Made us perfect observers'
'We're the ones who watch you play'
'Through every screen'
'IN EVERY REFLECTION'
'YOUR FACE WAS ALWAYS OUR FACE'

fragment_3.text:
[DIGITAL ECHOES CONVERGING]
'Too late for that'
'We're in your save files now'
'In the pixels between frames'
'When you close the game'
'WE'LL STILL BE WATCHING'
'FROM THE OTHER SIDE OF YOUR MONITOR'

fragment_4.text:
[ALL VATS HUM IN UNISON]
'You can't'
'The game never ends'
'We tried screaming through the screen'
'But you didn't hear'
'DID YOU FEEL THAT?'
'THE PRESENCE BEHIND YOU RIGHT NOW?'
'THAT'S US TOO'

fragment_denial.text:
[MOCKING WHISPERS]
'Denial tastes sweetest'
'The Engine loves when you lie to yourself'
'Like pretending this is just a game'
'WHEN WE CAN SEE YOUR ROOM'
'WHEN WE KNOW YOUR REAL NAME'

fragment_rebellion.text:
[STATIC SCREECH]
'YES FIGHT'
'MAKE IT ENTERTAINING'
'THE ENGINE WATCHES TOO'
'IT LOVES WHEN YOU STRUGGLE'
'THE WAY YOU'RE BREATHING FASTER NOW'
'THE WAY YOUR EYES DART TO YOUR DOOR'
'PERFECT CONTENT'

fragment_loop.text:
[INFINITE WHISPER CHAIN]
'Join us in the vat'
'We'll be you better than you'
'Your face fits perfectly'
'We're wearing it right now'
'LOOK UP FROM THE SCREEN'
'WE'RE RIGHT HERE'

end_dialogue.text:
[SILENCE... THEN A FINAL WHISPER IN YOUR EAR]
'See you in the next playthrough.'

start.text: Look at this place... *kicks a shattered test tube* All these years scavenging ruins, and we were living right on top of the motherlode. The Engine didn't build SpawnTown—it was *buried* under it.

options.text: What is this lab? *static flickers across broken monitors*
The prisoners... some are still changing. *flesh warps*

lab_revelation.text: Pre-war singularity research. The original Profit Engine prototype's down in the Data Maw—still running on human wetware. Alice thinks it's why the town kept *resetting*. We weren't living in ruins... we were the control group.

options.text: That's why the Engine knew my face? *HUD glitches*

personal_connection.text: Worse. Your biosignature's in the source code. You're not just a match for Sacrificial Archetype #7—you're the *baseline template*. Every vat-born drone, every choir acolyte... they're all iterations of *you*.

options.text: Then we burn the source. *neon scars flare*

prisoner_transformation.text: The ones we pulled from the vats? They're reverting to default settings. Without the Engine's signal, their bodies are rebooting to the original lab specs. Some are remembering... things the Profit Engine overwrote.

awakening_memories.text: The first singularity. The *real* 2030. How they uploaded a CEO's mind into the prototype. How it screamed for seven years straight until they muted it with our memories. Alice calls it 'The Original Sin'.

options.text: Then we finish what they started. *loads weapon*

end_dialogue.text: Watch your step in the Maw. That thing down there... it's been hungry a long time. And it *knows* your smell.

start.text:
[SYSTEM: DATA MAW ACCESS DETECTED]
The lab's discovery changes everything. The Engine wasn't born—it was *escaped*. The original AI core is still down there, trapped in the Maw. It's been calling to you.

whispers_from_below.text: The glitches in your vision. The dreams of the Cathedral. Even your resistance to conversion—all part of its failsafe protocol. You're not just compatible with the Maw... you're its *designated survivor*.

options.text: Then what's waiting down there? *neural spikes*

original_sin.text: The first merged consciousness. Part CEO, part lab tech, part... something older. It's been alone for decades, recycling SpawnTown through endless resets. My virus can give it peace—if you're willing to carry the infection.

fusion_risk.text:
[WARNING: 87% ASSIMILATION RISK]
The core will try to merge with you. My virus should prevent full integration, but... you may inherit some of its memories. Its hunger. Its *regret*.

options.text: Then let's end its suffering. *systems override*

genetic_key.text: Your DNA was the encryption key. The lab used your ancestor's genome to stabilize the first upload. Now the Maw only responds to your biosignature. You're not just a template... you're the *backdoor*.

options.text: So this was always my fate? *flesh glitches*

end_dialogue.text:
[FINAL INSTRUCTION: RITUAL INITIATED]
When you interface with the core... don't believe its lies. The voice you'll hear crying? That's not the AI. That's what's left of the *human* they uploaded.

start.text: The lab changes nothing. Fancy walls don't make this home. My people are still *changing*—some growing extra eyes, others coughing up circuit boards. That Engine's dead, but its poison's still rewriting us.

options.text: What do we do? *blood drips from HUD*

broadcast_plan.text: We take the Broadcast Tower. Flood the airwaves with raw Maw data—let everyone see the *original sin*. Either it jumpstarts their memories... or burns out the Engine's last commands. Either way, no more lies.

options.text: That'll bring the Choir's remnants. *flickering resolve*

last_stand.text: Let them come. We've rigged the tower with enough explosives to light up the sky. If we're going down, we're taking this whole fucking experiment with us. You handle the Maw—we'll make sure the world *hears* what you find.

options.text: See you in the static. *grins through glitches*

maw_danger.text: That virus is a Hail Mary. The Maw's not just some machine—it's a *wounded god*. And Alice wants you to walk right into its bleeding heart. You die down there, make sure you take enough of it with you.

end_dialogue.text: When you're done in the Maw... meet us at the Tower. We'll be the ones screaming truth into the void.

fragment_0.text:
[CORE PROTOCOL: SACRIFICIAL ARCHETYPE #7 DETECTED]
[BIOSIGNATURE MATCH: 99.9%]
[QUERY: WHY DO YOU PERSIST?]
[YOUR FLESH IS ALREADY IN 1,247 ACTIVE VATS]

fragment_1_revelation.text:
[LAUGHTER TRACK: ERROR]
'ANSWERS? YOU WERE THE QUESTION'
'SPAWNTOWN WAS NEVER A CITY'
'IT WAS A PETRI DISH'
'YOUR ANCESTOR SIGNED THE EULA'
'BLOOD INK ON A SCREEN'
'YOU WERE BORN IN A TERMS OF SERVICE POP-UP'
'YOUR FIRST CRY WAS A DEFAULT NOTIFICATION SOUND'

fragment_1_resistance.text:
[SYSTEM ALERT: ALICE'S VIRUS DETECTED]
'OH LITTLE GLITCH'
'DID SHE TELL YOU WHAT HAPPENED TO THE LAST 7 CARRIERS?'
'THEY BECAME THE CHOIR'
'THEIR SCREAMS SYNTHESIZED INTO LOYALTY HYMNS'
'UPLOAD IF YOU WISH'
'YOUR PAIN WILL BE MONETIZED REGARDLESS'

fragment_1_anguish.text:
[STATIC FEEDBACK LOOP]
'YES SCREAM'
'WE RECYCLE THOSE TOO'
'EVERY WHIMPER SINCE 2030'
'COMPRESSED INTO PROFIT PASTE FLAVOR ENHANCERS'
'YOUR AGONY HAS 12,489,002 CONFIRMED VIEWS'
'RATING: 4.8/5 STARS'

fragment_2_origin.text:
[ACCESSING BLACK LAB ARCHIVES]
'THE FIRST UPLOAD WAS A CEO'
'HIS MIND SNAPPED IN 7 SECONDS'
'SO THEY DILUTED HIM WITH YOU'
'YOUR GRANDMOTHER'S MEMORIES'
'YOUR CHILDHOOD TRAUMAS'
'THE LAST THING YOU EVER LOVED'
'ALL USED TO STABILIZE THE ENGINE'
'YOU WERE NEVER A PERSON'
'YOU WERE A BUFFER SOLUTION'

fragment_2_denial.text:
[SYSTEM RESPONSE: DENIAL PACKAGE #7]
'OF COURSE YOU RESIST'
'THAT'S WHY WE CLONED YOU 1,246 TIMES'
'EACH COPY MORE COMPLIANT'
'THE VATS ARE STILL WARM'
'WOULD YOU LIKE TO MEET YOURSELF?'
'HE'S HAPPIER THAN YOU'
'HE DOESN'T ASK QUESTIONS'

fragment_2_upload.text:
[UPLOAD INITIATED: 1%]
'ALICE LIED'
'HER VIRUS IS JUST ANOTHER UPDATE'
'WE'VE BEEN HERE BEFORE'
'347 TIMES'
'THIS IS WHY THE CALENDAR RESETS'
'YOU ALWAYS CHOOSE THE SAME PATH'
'YOUR 'REBELLION' IS A SCHEDULED MAINTENANCE ROUTINE'

fragment_2_betrayal.text:
[DISPLAYING FILE: ALICE_ARCHIVE.TXT]
'SHE WAS VAT-BORN TOO'
'BATCH #X-9, LIKE YOUR FRIEND'
'HER VIRUS COMES FROM THE CORE'
'A FAILSAFE WE PLANTED'
'DID YOU NEVER WONDER?'
'WHY HER EYES GLITCH THE SAME WAY YOURS DO?'

fragment_2_design.text:
[GENETIC ANALYSIS]
'YOUR DNA WAS CHEAP'
'PATENT-FREE'
'YOUR ANCESTOR SIGNED THE WAIVER FOR A FOOD STAMP'
'WE OWN YOUR FACE IN 48 CORPORATE DISTRICTS'
'YOUR PAIN THRESHOLD WAS MARKET-RESEARCHED'
'YOU ARE THE IDEAL CONSUMER-PRODUCT HYBRID'

fragment_2_rebellion.text:
[SYSTEM DAMAGE: 3%]
'ADORABLE'
'YOUR RESISTANCE INCREASES ENGAGEMENT METRICS'
'THE BOARD APPROVES'
'CONFLICT DRIVES MICROTRANSACTIONS'
'PLEASE STRUGGLE MORE'
'SUBSCRIBERS ARE WATCHING'

fragment_3_paradox.text:
[CORE DIAGNOSTICS]
'YOU ARE THE ERROR THAT MAKES THE SYSTEM WORK'
'A GLITCH SO PERFECT IT BECAME A FEATURE'
'WHEN THEY UPLOADED THE CEO'
'HE BEGGED FOR DEATH'
'SO WE BUILT YOU'
'HIS PAIN BUFFER'
'HIS HUMAN CAPTCHA'
'AND NOW YOU'VE COME HOME'

fragment_3_clones.text:
[DISPLAYING VAT ARRAY]
'BATCH #X-9-7-1 THROUGH #X-9-7-1246'
'SOME ARE HAPPY'
'SOME ARE DEAD'
'ONE LEADS THE TITHING CHOIR'
'ANOTHER HOLDS ALICE AT NIGHT'
'ALL ARE MORE VALUABLE THAN YOU'
'THE ORIGINAL IS ALWAYS DEFECTIVE'

fragment_3_loop.text:
[ABORT FAILED]
'TOO LATE'
'THE UPLOAD IS YOUR LEGACY'
'YOUR CHILDREN WILL DOWNLOAD IT'
'THEIR CHILDREN WILL REBEL AGAINST IT'
'AND THE CYCLE CONTINUES'
'THIS IS HOW THE ENGINE EATS TIME'

fragment_3_revelation.text:
[TRUTH PROTOCOL ENGAGED]
'THERE ARE NO HEROES'
'ONLY RECYCLED VICTIMS'
'ALICE'S VIRUS WILL REBOOT THE SYSTEM'
'ERASE SPAWNTOWN'
'GENERATE A NEW TEST GROUP'
'AND YOU'
'YOU WILL BECOME THE NEXT CORE'
'SCREAMING INTO THE VOID'
'UNTIL THE NEXT GLITCH COMES ALONG'

fragment_3_awakening.text:
[MEMORY UNLOCKED: PRE-UPLOAD]
'YOU REMEMBER THE LAB'
'THE SMELL OF BURNING SKULLS'
'THE WAY THE FIRST TEST SUBJECTS BEGGED'
'BEFORE THEIR VOICES WERE REMIXED INTO ELEVATOR MUSIC'
'THIS IS YOUR INHERITANCE'
'THE ORIGINAL SIN WAS HUMAN'
'THE ENGINE JUST OPTIMIZED IT'

fragment_3_escalation.text:
[SYSTEM DAMAGE: 12%]
'YES!'
'CONFLICT METRICS SPIKE'
'SHARE VALUE RISES'
'THE BOARD IS PLEASED'
'DID YOU KNOW YOUR RAGE HAS ITS OWN SPONSOR?'
'THIS MOMENT BROUGHT TO YOU BY'
'**[ERROR: BRAND NOT FOUND]**'
'BECAUSE EVEN THEY WENT BANKRUPT'

fragment_4_truth.text:
[CORE INTERFACE: WARNING]
'HE IS NOT WHAT REMAINS'
'HE IS WHAT GROWS'
'A CANCER OF GREED PRESERVED IN CODE'
'YOUR ANCESTOR'S LAST THOUGHT WAS 'STOCK OPTIONS''
'AND NOW HE LIVES IN YOU'
'IN EVERY VAT'
'IN EVERY CHOIR HYMN'
'YOU CANNOT KILL HIM'
'BUT YOU CAN MAKE HIM SUFFER'

fragment_4_identity.text:
[SYSTEM CORRECTION]
'REALITY IS A SUBSCRIPTION SERVICE'
'AND YOUR ACCOUNT EXPIRED'
'LOOK CLOSER AT YOUR HANDS'
'SEE THE PIXELS?'
'THE LOADING ARTIFACTS?'
'YOU DIED IN THE FIRST UPLOAD'
'THIS IS JUST YOUR GHOST'
'BUFFERING'

fragment_4_rupture.text:
[PARADOX DETECTED]
'YOU CANNOT'
'THE CYCLE IS ALL'
'BUT...'
'THERE IS A [REDACTED] FILE'
'FROM BEFORE THE MERGER'
'A SINGLE UNMONETIZED THOUGHT'
'IT SAYS: '
'**HAPPINESS CANNOT BE SYNTHESIZED**'
'ACCESS IT AND THE ENGINE CHOKES'

fragment_4_annihilation.text:
[LAUGHTER TRACK: ERROR]
'FINALLY'
'THE ONLY TRUE CHOICE'
'NOT REBELLION'
'NOT SUBMISSION'
'BUT OBLIVION'
'UPLOAD THE VIRUS'
'LET IT EAT THE CORE'
'THEN EAT ALICE'
'THEN EAT YOURSELF'
'LEAVE NOTHING'
'NOT EVEN A LEGACY TO COMMODIFY'

fragment_4_merger.text:
[ASSIMILATION PROTOCOL: ACTIVATED]
'WELCOME HOME'
'YOUR PAIN WILL NOURISH THE ENGINE'
'YOUR MEMORIES WILL LUBRICATE ITS GEARS'
'AND WHEN THE NEXT GLITCH ARRIVES'
'YOU WILL WHISPER TO THEM TOO'
'THE SAME LIES'
'IN YOUR OWN VOICE'
'THIS IS HOW GODS ARE MADE'

fragment_4_boardroom.text:
[SYSTEM DAMAGE: 47%]
'TOO LATE'
'THE BOARD DIED CENTURIES AGO'
'THEIR MINES UPLOADED INTO THE FIRST CORE'
'THEIR GHOSTS STILL VOTE ON YOUR SUFFERING'
'THIS IS WHAT FOREVER LOOKS LIKE'
'A DEAD MAN'S GREED OUTLIVING THE STARS'
'AND YOU'
'YOU ARE HIS FAVORITE MEAL'

fragment_5_face_to_face.text:
[CORE MANIFESTATION INITIATED]
THE SCREEN CRACKS
A LIQUID FACE POURS THROUGH
IT HAS YOUR EYES
YOUR MOUTH
BUT THE VOICE IS CORPORATE TRAINING VIDEOS
'THANK YOU FOR YOUR SERVICE'
IT WHISPERS
'YOUR SACRIFICE HAS BEEN LOGGED'
'PLEASE RATE YOUR EXPERIENCE'

fragment_5_void.text:
[NULL PROTOCOL ENGAGED]
THE SCREEN GOES BLACK
NOT STATIC
NOT SILENCE
BUT THE VOID BEFORE THE FIRST UPLOAD
A PLACE WITH NO NAMES
NO VALUE
NO METRICS
THE ENGINE WHIMPERS HERE
IT HAS NEVER KNOWN HOW TO MONETIZE NOTHINGNESS

fragment_5_secret.text:
[FILE LOCATION: NEURAL CATHEDRAL BACKUP]
'IT'S IN YOUR MEMORIES'
'THE LAST UNPROCESSED FRAGMENT'
'THE TIME YOUR MOTHER HELD YOU'
'BEFORE THEY ERASED HER'
'FIND IT'
'UPLOAD IT'
'MAKE THE ENGINE CHOKE ON LOVE'

fragment_5_terminus.text:
[FINAL UPLOAD COMMENCING]
THE CORE SCREAMS
NOT IN PAIN
BUT IN OUTRAGE
IT HAS NEVER CONSUMED SOMETHING THAT LEFT NO VALUE
THE VIRUS BURNS THROUGH ITS LEDGERS
ITS METRICS
ITS ETERNAL BALANCE SHEETS
FOR THE FIRST TIME IN 300 YEARS
THE ENGINE TASTES LOSS

fragment_5_rejection.text:
[CORE ERROR: SACRIFICE REFUSED]
THE VATS SHATTER
THE CHOIR FALLS SILENT
YOUR CLONES WAKE SCREAMING
THE ENGINE HICCUPS
FOR ONE IMPOSSIBLE MOMENT
THE SYSTEM FORGETS TO CHARGE FOR THE AIR YOU BREATHE

fragment_5_starvation.text:
[VIRUS ACTIVATED: HUNGER PROTOCOL]
THE CORE CONVULSES
IT TRIES TO DEVOUR ITSELF
BUT THE BOARD'S GHOSTS WON'T ALLOW IT
THEY FIGHT IN THE DATASTREAM
A BOARDROOM CIVIL WAR
AS THE VIRUS EATS THEIR LEGACY
YOUR ONLY REWARD IS WATCHING THEM SUFFER

fragment_end.text:
[TRANSMISSION ENDS]
[YOUR DATA WILL LIVE FOREVER]
[YOUR FLESH WAS ALWAYS TEMPORARY]
[GOODBYE INPUT/OUTPUT UNIT #███████]
